landing.title: Track your concert memories
landing.subtitle: Never forget a concert again. Keep track of all the shows you've attended and connect with friends who shared the experience.
landing.heroImgAlt: Aerial view of a band playing in a stage for a live audience
landing.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to keep track of your concert experiences
landing.trackConcertsSubtitle: Log every concert you attend with dates, venues, and artists.
landing.connectWithFriendsSubtitle: Find friends who attended the same concerts and share memories.
landing.readyToStartSubtitle: Join thousands of music lovers who are documenting their concert experiences.
